Package stacs.yahtzee

Interface YahtzeeModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
YahtzeeModelImpl
public interface YahtzeeModel
This interface defines the model for a game of Yahtzee. It relies on numerous other classes, such as 'Player' and 'Dice'. The rules of Yahtzee as it implemented here, with some exceptions, can be found at: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yahtzee

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addDiceToGame()
    Create new 'dice' objects and add the game's list of dice.
    void addPlayersToGame​(int numPlayers)
    Create new 'player' object for each player, and add to the game's list of players.
    Player getActivePlayer()
    Returns the player who's turn it is.
    int getCurrentRound()
    Returns the number of the current round.
    java.util.List<Dice> getDice()
    Returns the dice that belong to the current game
    Player getPlayerWithHighestScore()
    This method returns the player with highest score.
    int getTotalRounds()
    Returns the total number of rounds in the game.
    boolean isGameFinished()
    Method to check if the game is finished.
    void registerTurnFinished​(Player playerFinishingTurn)
    Called by a player object when the player finishes their turn.
    YahtzeeModel reStart()
    Returns a new game in the starting condition with the same number of players.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayersToGame

      void addPlayersToGame​(int numPlayers)
      Create new 'player' object for each player, and add to the game's list of players.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - The number of players specified as a parameter in the constructor in the game object

    • addDiceToGame

      void addDiceToGame()
      Create new 'dice' objects and add the game's list of dice. The number of dice is specified in the constants file.

    • getDice

      java.util.List<Dice> getDice()
      Returns the dice that belong to the current game

    • getActivePlayer

      Player getActivePlayer()
      Returns the player who's turn it is.

    • getCurrentRound

      int getCurrentRound()
      Returns the number of the current round.

    • getTotalRounds

      int getTotalRounds()
      Returns the total number of rounds in the game.

    • registerTurnFinished

      void registerTurnFinished​(Player playerFinishingTurn) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Called by a player object when the player finishes their turn. This allows the model to assign the next player as the active player, or to finish the game.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • getPlayerWithHighestScore

      Player getPlayerWithHighestScore()
      This method returns the player with highest score. When the game is finished, the person with the highest score is the winner.

    • isGameFinished

      boolean isGameFinished()
      Method to check if the game is finished. This always returns true after the last player's turn in the last round.
      Returns:
      True if the game is finished, otherwise false

    • reStart

      YahtzeeModel reStart()
      Returns a new game in the starting condition with the same number of players.
      Returns:
      The new game in the starting condition
